about_the_game:
Become the football world champion: Make the dream of all football players and coaches come true with WE ARE FOOTBALL. The National Teams DLC adds all international games to the main game, allowing players to hold the sceptre for any national team of their choice. This naturally includes both the men's and women's teams. As manager, you can perform your duties for the national team while building your own club career. As well as taking your team to the World Cup or European Championship, you can plan your squads, negotiate contracts with clubs and associations, handle citizenships, and more.

FEATURES

  • For club and country: Choose your national team in addition to your club
  • Make your choice: Receive national team coaching jobs over the course of the game
  • Friendly or tough: Negotiate with the individual national associations
  • Play for time: Don’t have a lot of time? You can manage the national team for a single tournament
  • You have to be in it to win it: Make it through the qualification groups before the tournaments
  • Pick your team: Call up your squad before the qualifications and the tournaments
  • Legal alien: Make sure your top players get citizenship so that they can play in your national team
  • Practice makes perfect: Persuade clubs to sign promising youth players early enough for them to be nominated for the national team
  • Take two: Starting in 2022, a European Championship or World Cup is held every two years Gauge the mood: Read post-matchday newspaper headlines for European Championship and World Cup tournaments
  • Keep it quick: Play any tournament (European Championship/World Cup for both men and women) in standalone mode

New club-level features

  • Less is more: Choose playable countries at the start of the game to speed up play on less powerful computers
  • Negotiate contracts with clubs as the manager
  • Triumph with tactics: Take the opportunity to analyse potential opponents in advance
  • In the mood to shop: Comprehensive transfer market tuning
  • Cultivating talent: Optimised talent development
  • You always meet twice: Better comeback qualities for bigger clubs
  • Money makes the world go around: New finance stats with info on transfer behaviour A test of strength: Advanced team strengths stats with additional transfer market info
  • New player salary stats
  • For perfectionists: New "Clean Sheets" stats
  • Nicer welcome: New arrival screen with extra details
  • The youth of today: New options for generating youth players
